user.name: Nihagi
user.about:
Yo, I'm just your average 28 year old who finds some fun in making styles now and then.

If you happen to like any of the styles I made, feel free to voice it.

If you got a site you want me to style for you, I might not be the right person to ask.
I'm extremely lazy and only do whatever I feel for in the moment.
But if that wont hold you back, feel free to ask me the favor.

Cheers~
